title: 📊 Market Intel — Sun Feb 15, 2026 6:00 PM ET
content:
# 📊 Market Intel — Sunday, Feb 15, 2026 @ 6:00 PM ET

**Top Headlines: NBA All-Star Weekend in full swing | 2026 Winter Olympics underway in Milan-Cortina | Gold breaks $5,000 | Truth Social files for crypto ETFs | Ethereum Foundation leadership shakeup**

---

## 🔥 Top Trending

- **NBA All-Star Game TODAY** — Round Robin format at Intuit Dome, Inglewood CA. Team Stars vs Team Stripes, World vs Team Stripes, then Championship game. World beat Team Stars 37-35 in OT. LeBron says he has "no idea" if he'll play a 24th season. Giannis reaffirms commitment to Milwaukee Bucks.
- **2026 Winter Olympics — Milan-Cortina** — US Men's Hockey dominates Group C, beating Germany 5-1, Latvia 5-1, and Denmark 6-3. Won group with 9 pts, earns bye to quarterfinals. NHL players are back in Olympics.
- **Gold above $5,000** — Gold futures at $5,029.20, a historic milestone. Safe haven demand remains strong.
- **Truth Social files for crypto ETFs** — Trump-linked platform seeks SEC approval for BTC/ETH ETF and a staking-focused Cronos fund.
- **Markets closed Monday (Presidents' Day)**

---

## 📈 Stock Movers (Friday Close)

- **S&P 500:** 6,836.17 (+0.05%) — grinding near all-time highs
- **DJIA:** 49,500.93 (+0.10%) — approaching 50K
- **Nasdaq:** 22,546.67 (-0.22%) — slight tech weakness
- **FTSE 100:** 10,446.35 (+0.42%)
- **Nikkei 225:** 56,941.97 (-1.21%) — Japan weakness continues
- **Euro STOXX 50:** 5,985.23 (-0.43%)

**Hedge Fund Top Picks (Yahoo Finance trending):**
- NVDA (Clifford Asness), META (Philippe Laffont), AAPL (John Overdeck), MSFT (Chase Coleman III), AMZN (Mason Morfit), GOOGL (Christopher Rokos), PDD (Zhang Lei), CVS (Larry Robbins), PCG (Michael Platt), GRBK (David Einhorn)
- NVDA mentioned across 4+ different fund managers — still the consensus AI play

**Note:** Markets closed Monday Feb 16 for Presidents' Day. Next trading day is Tuesday.

---

## 💰 Crypto & Digital Assets

- **BTC:** Flat/little changed heading into weekend
- **Truth Social crypto ETFs:** Filed with SEC for BTC+ETH ETF and Cronos staking fund — deepening Trump brand's crypto ambitions
- **Coinbase (COIN):** Wall Street slashed price targets after Q4 miss (Barclays, JPMorgan, Benchmark, Clear Street) — but shares still rallied. Weak retail trading cited.
- **Ethereum Foundation shakeup:** Tomasz Stańczak out as co-executive director (joined 2025 after Aya Miyaguchi departed)
- **Stablecoin fight:** Crypto group counters Wall Street bankers at White House — bankers want total ban on stablecoin yield, crypto side pushes back demanding some rewards
- **UNI +5.4%, BCH +5.3%** — top CoinDesk 20 performers
- **Ark Invest:** Bought $18M crypto stocks — 10th consecutive Bullish purchase + $12M Robinhood + $4M Bitmine Immersion
- **PGI Global CEO:** 20-year sentence for $200M bitcoin Ponzi scheme
- **DeFi regulation:** US-based DeFi Education Fund urges UK FCA not to regulate non-custodial protocol developers as intermediaries
- **Sentiment:** "Crypto market wobbles as investors ignore good news, look for exit ramp" — cautious mood despite positive catalysts

---

## 🚀 Tesla / SpaceX / Elon

- No major breaking news this weekend. Markets closed Monday.
- Watching for: Any Elon tweets during All-Star/Olympics weekend, DOGE/government efficiency updates

---

## 💻 Hacker News / Tech

**Top stories on HN right now:**
1. **"I'm joining OpenAI"** (steipete.me) — 217 pts, 130 comments. Major discussion about OpenAI talent acquisition
2. **"I fixed Windows native development"** — 615 pts, 299 comments. Massive engagement on dev tooling
3. **EU bans destruction of unsold apparel/clothing/footwear** — 660 pts, 444 comments. Huge policy story with market implications for fashion/retail
4. **Radio host says Google's NotebookLM stole his voice** (WaPo) — AI voice cloning controversy, potential legal/regulatory implications for Google
5. **"Towards Autonomous Mathematics Research"** (arxiv) — 63 pts. AI autonomy frontier research
6. **"I Gave Claude Access to My Pen Plotter"** — Anthropic/Claude creative use cases trending
7. **MicroGPT: GPT you can visualize in the browser** — 59 pts
8. **LT6502: 6502-based homebrew laptop** — 266 pts
9. **Modern CSS Code Snippets** — 135 pts
10. **Magnus Carlsen wins Freestyle (Chess960) World Championship** — just posted

**AI/Tech Themes:** OpenAI hiring spree, Google AI voice ethics, autonomous AI research, browser-based ML visualization

---

## 🦍 Reddit / WSB

- **WSB:** Weekly Earnings Thread 2/16-2/20 is pinned (179 upvotes). Big earnings week ahead.
- **r/stocks:** Quarterly portfolio review thread active. Standard weekend discussion mode.
- **r/cryptocurrency:** Daily discussion active. Cautious sentiment matching CoinDesk's "exit ramp" narrative.
- Weekend = lower activity. Real action resumes Tuesday (Monday holiday).

**Earnings to Watch This Week (2/16-2/20):** Thread just posted — likely includes NVDA ecosystem plays, retail, and tech names. Check Tuesday pre-market for specific tickers.

---

## 🏈 Sports & Betting

### NBA All-Star Weekend (TODAY)
- **All-Star Game at Intuit Dome, Inglewood CA** — New round-robin format
- World 37, Team Stars 35 (OT) in first game
- Team Stars vs Team Stripes, World vs Team Stripes, then Championship TBD
- **Key quotes:** LeBron uncertain about 24th season, Jaylen Brown eyeing UFC/boxing post-NBA, Giannis committed to Bucks

### 2026 Winter Olympics — Milan-Cortina
- **US Men's Hockey:** Swept Group C (9 pts) — bye to quarterfinals Wednesday
  - Beat Latvia 5-1, Denmark 6-3, Germany 5-1
  - Key players: Noah Hanifin, Matt Boldy, Jake Guentzel
- **Pebble Beach Pro-Am:** Live on ESPN
- **NCAA Basketball:** Full slate of men's and women's games
- **FA Cup:** Fourth Round matches (soccer)

### Betting
- All-Star props and Olympics hockey likely getting action
- NCAA basketball weekend slate = heavy betting volume
- Presidents' Day weekend = lighter sharp money on futures

---

## 💎 Commodities & Macro

| Asset | Price | Change |
|-------|-------|--------|
| **Gold** | $5,029.20 | +0.14% ✨ (above $5K!) |
| **Copper** | $1,211.50 | +0.43% |
| **Brent Crude** | $67.73 | -0.03% |
| **US 10Y Yield** | 4.048% | -0.008 |
| **EUR/USD** | 1.1871 | +0.02% |
| **GBP/USD** | 1.3645 | -0.03% |

**Key observations:**
- **Gold above $5,000** is a psychological milestone — safe haven demand, inflation hedging, central bank buying all contributing
- **Oil weak at $67** — demand concerns persist
- **10Y yield at 4.05%** — relatively stable, Fed on hold
- **Dollar mixed** — EUR strength notable (1.1871)
- **Nikkei -1.21%** — Japan underperforming, yen dynamics
- Markets closed Monday — next data points Tuesday

---

## 🌍 What X Is Talking About

- **NBA All-Star Game** dominating sports Twitter — LeBron retirement speculation, new format reactions
- **Olympics hockey** — US hockey fans buzzing about dominant group stage
- **Gold $5K** — FinTwit celebrating/debating the milestone
- **Truth Social crypto ETFs** — political-finance crossover generating heat
- **Google NotebookLM voice theft** — AI ethics debate heating up
- **Magnus Carlsen Chess960 win** — chess community active

---

*Report generated Sunday, Feb 15, 2026 @ 6:00 PM ET*
*Sources: Reuters, CoinDesk, Yahoo Finance, Hacker News, Reddit (WSB/stocks/crypto), ESPN, CNBC*
*Next scan: ~8:00 PM ET*
